name: Cowboys vs. Space Vampires
description:
What do cowboys, space, and vampires have in common? NOTHING. Join Reckless Ruby and Charming Charlie as they fight through waves of evil space vampires! Careful tho… interacting with an enemy of a different color may have some undesirable consequences….

Play by yourself or with a friend in this top-down, arcade style shooter with a twist!

Optional multiplayer, playable with split keyboard or multiple controllers.

Music created using Soundtrap

Laser sound effect: BerlinAtmospheres 

Hit sound effect: Soundchips

Team Name: control alt defeat

Team Members:

  • Kalista Bailey
  • Alexander Ling
